allow: Bash(curl -s -X POST http://localhost:5000/api/projects -H "Content-Type: application/json" -d '{""name"": ""Test Project"", ""description"": ""A test project""}')
Bash(docker exec -i terarchitect-postgres-1 psql -U terarchitect -d terarchitect -c "ALTER TABLE projects ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS github_url TEXT;")
Bash(docker exec -i terarchitect-postgres psql -U terarchitect -d terarchitect -c "ALTER TABLE projects ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS github_url TEXT;")
Bash(docker exec -i terarchitect-postgres psql -U terarchitect -d terarchitect -c "\\d projects")
Bash(docker exec -i terarchitect-postgres psql -U terarchitect -d terarchitect -c "ALTER TABLE projects RENAME COLUMN git_repo_path TO project_path;")

Bash(docker exec -i terarchitect-postgres psql -U terarchitect -d terarchitect -c "SELECT column_name, data_type FROM information_schema.columns WHERE table_name = ''projects'' ORDER BY ordinal_position;")
